definitions.definition: A long loose outer garment , often signifying honorary stature.
The skin of an animal, especially the bison , dressed with the fur on, and used as a wrap .
A wardrobe , especially one built into a bedroom .
The largest and strongest tobacco leaves .

main_definition: A long loose outer garment , often signifying honorary stature.
secondary_definitions: ( US ) The skin of an animal, especially the bison , dressed with the fur on, and used as a wrap .
A wardrobe , especially one built into a bedroom .
The largest and strongest tobacco leaves .
